ExternalData.Conclusion: Geneva, 19 February 1925, and Lake Success, New York, 11 December 1946<superscript>1</superscript>

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 3 February 1948, the date on which the amendments to the Convention, as set forth in the annex to the Protocol of 11 December 1946, entered into force, in accordance with paragraph 2 of article VII of the Protocol.
